meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carol Schlau Manoj Mate Bill Alston Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4060.

td.p: Carol Schlau, a newspaper copy editor from Buffalo, New York
Manoj Mate, an attorney from San Francisco, California
Bill Alston, an accountant from Durham, North Carolina (whose 2-day cash winnings total $53,400)

tr.td: DOWN IN THE VALLEY
ENTERTAINMENT FIRSTS
NOT A POPE
(Alex: You have to ID which one is [*] in the lists I will give you.)
(Alex: And then, for less-than-intelligent humans we have...)
THE DARWIN AWARDS
CHARLES IN CHARGE
ENU"FF" ALREADY!

(Carol: Battering?)

---

headbutting

Carol
Triple Stumper
')

BillManoj

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [After revealing Carol\'s response] Anna Karenina threw herself in front of a train, and [*] died at a train station.)
...
(Alex: [After revealing Bill\'s response] Thinking probably of Madame Bovary.)
CarolWho is Tolstoy?
$4,799
ManojWho Dostoevsky
$7,598
BillWho is Flaubert?
$17,800
Tolstoy')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Like one of his most famous heroines, he died at a train station in 1910')

tr.td: AUTHORS
Like one of his most famous heroines, he died at a train station in 1910
Bill
Manoj
Carol
3rd place: trip for 2 to Florida's Space Coast
2nd place: trip for 2 to the French West Indies
New champion: $9,599
Bill
Manoj
Carol

19 R
(including 1 DD),
1 W

16 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
